Just downloaded this and am having troubles. I've done this before so it's /probably/ not a new user problem. When I launch the game, it says "TS3W.exe is not a Windows 32-bit program." This confused me because I moved everything where it should have been. I took a look and apparently, my TS3W.exe that I got from the download was 0 bits in size. Any suggestions / thoughts?

HeOfMalice,the first you see when you open what you've download is a folder called The.Sims.3.Seasons.Crackfix-Reloaded,open it and you'll see a winrar archive.....unrar and move the crack to game/bin.....this will work ;)
awesome! it worked just fine! I installed the game on mac and this crack fix was perfect.
